landing.cta.description: Join thousands of developers building with Laravel SAAS Starter today.
landing.cta.title: Ready to build your SaaS?
landing.faq.description: Everything you need to know about the starter kit.
landing.faq.questions.1.answer: It is a production-ready starter kit for building SaaS applications with Laravel.
landing.faq.questions.1.question: What is Laravel SAAS Starter?
landing.faq.questions.2.answer: Yes, it is 100% free and open source under the MIT license.
landing.faq.questions.2.question: Is it free to use?
landing.faq.questions.3.answer: Absolutely! You can use it for as many commercial projects as you like.
landing.faq.questions.3.question: Can I use it for commercial projects?
landing.faq.questions.4.answer: Support is provided via GitHub issues.
landing.faq.questions.4.question: Do you offer support?
landing.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
landing.features.description: A complete stack to build your next big idea.
landing.features.list.billing.title: Billing
landing.features.list.teams.title: Teams
landing.features.list.ui.description: Beautiful components built with Shadcn UI and Tailwind.
landing.features.list.ui.title: Modern UI
landing.features.title: Everything you need
landing.hero.description: Launch your next SaaS idea in minutes, not months. Comes with authentication, billing, teams, and everything you need to get started.
landing.hero.title: The Ultimate Laravel SaaS Starter Kit
landing.meta.description: Laravel SAAS Starter is a production-ready Laravel SaaS starter kit with authentication, billing, teams, and everything you need to launch faster. Built by XCO Agency.
landing.meta.keywords: laravel, saas, starter kit, boilerplate, authentication, stripe, billing, teams
landing.meta.og_description: Production-ready Laravel SaaS starter kit. 100% free and open source. Launch your SaaS 10x faster with authentication, billing, teams, and more.
landing.meta.og_title: Laravel SAAS Starter - Launch Your SaaS 10x Faster
landing.meta.title: Laravel SAAS Starter - Launch Your SaaS 10x Faster
landing.meta.twitter_description: Production-ready Laravel SaaS starter kit by XCO Agency.
landing.meta.twitter_title: Laravel SAAS Starter - Launch Your SaaS 10x Faster
landing.pricing.description: Choose the plan that's right for you.
landing.pricing.title: Simple Pricing
landing.testimonials.1.author: Sarah Chen
landing.testimonials.1.quote: This starter kit saved me weeks of development time. It's incredibly well structured and easy to customize.
landing.testimonials.2.author: Alex Rivera
landing.testimonials.2.quote: The best Laravel boilerplates I've used. The code quality is outstanding and the features are exactly what I needed.
landing.testimonials.3.author: Jordan Smith
landing.testimonials.3.quote: I was able to launch my MVP in a weekend thanks to this kit. Highly recommended!
landing.testimonials.description: Here's what people are saying about Laravel SAAS Starter.
landing.testimonials.items.emily.quote: Best SaaS starter kit I've used. The Stripe integration worked flawlessly, and the dark mode looks beautiful. Highly recommended!
landing.testimonials.items.michael.quote: The code quality is exceptional. It's clear that experienced Laravel developers built this. The multi-workspace feature was exactly what we needed.
landing.testimonials.items.sarah.quote: Laravel SAAS Starter saved us months of development time. The authentication, billing, and team management were all ready to go. We launched our MVP in just 2 weeks!
landing.testimonials.title: Loved by Developers
settings.appearance.title: Appearance settings
settings.delete_account.confirm_descript: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will also be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
settings.delete_account.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
settings.delete_account.description: Delete your account and all of its resources
settings.delete_account.title: Delete account
settings.delete_account.warning_message: Please proceed with caution, this cannot be undone.
settings.description: Manage your workspace and account settings
settings.language.title: Language
settings.password.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure
settings.password.title: Update password
settings.profile.description: Update your name and email address
settings.profile.name: Name
settings.profile.resend_verification: Click here to resend the verification email.
settings.profile.title: Profile information
settings.profile.verification_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
settings.title: Settings
settings.two_factor.disabled_description: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure pin during login. This pin can be retrieved from a TOTP-supported application on your phone.
settings.two_factor.enabled_description: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login, which you can retrieve from the TOTP-supported application on your phone.
settings.two_factor.recovery_codes.descr: Recovery codes let you regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
settings.two_factor.recovery_codes.title: 2FA Recovery Codes
settings.two_factor.recovery_codes.warni: Each recovery code can be used once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click Regenerate Codes above.
settings.two_factor.setup_modal.enable_d: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app
settings.two_factor.setup_modal.enabled_: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
settings.two_factor.setup_modal.verify_d: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
settings.two_factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
team.invite_description: Enter the email address and role for the new team member.
team.pending_invitations_desc: Invitations that have been sent but not yet accepted.
team.role_description: Admins can manage team members and workspace settings.
team.team_members_desc: All members currently in your workspace.
team.title: Team

workspace.create.details_description: Enter the details for your new workspace.
workspace.create.name: Workspace Name
workspace.create.slug_description: This will be used in URLs. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.
workspace.create.title: Create Workspace
workspace.list.description: Manage your workspaces and collaborate with your team.
workspace.list.get_started: Get started by creating your first workspace.
workspace.list.title: Workspaces
workspace.settings.delete_confirm: Type the workspace name to confirm deletion
workspace.settings.delete_description: Once you delete a workspace, there is no going back. Please be certain.
workspace.settings.description: Manage your workspace settings and configuration.
workspace.settings.name: Workspace Name
workspace.settings.personal_workspace: This is your personal workspace and cannot be deleted.
workspace.settings.title: Workspace Settings
workspace.webhooks.title: Webhooks
workspace.webhooks.heading: Webhooks
workspace.webhooks.description: Manage external webhook endpoints triggered by workspace activity.
workspace.webhooks.create_description: Configure a secure HTTPS endpoint to capture external payloads.
workspace.webhooks.endpoints_desc: Endpoints currently receiving payloads generated within your workspace.
workspace.webhooks.logs.title: Delivery Logs
workspace.webhooks.logs.heading: Delivery Logs
workspace.webhooks.logs.description: Review recent outbound webhook attempts and inspect payloads.
workspace.webhooks.logs.recent_desc: Track the success and failure states of payloads sent by your workspace.

admin.mail_templates.list_description: These templates natively override code-defined Mailable classes during dispatch.
